name: COASTAL GEORGIA MILITARY AFFAIRS COALITION
description: public/private partnership in support of military services at Ft. Stewart and Hunter AAF
sampleDescriptions: Support civilian community efforts to enhance the military value and employment/economic activities relating to the Fort Stewart/Hunter Army Airfield installation, to include military construction app
